EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Dealer Update #10.2020 Dealer Update #10
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - November 9, 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | November 2020 New Sales Bulletin Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2020-42 Rev C <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-42-Rev-C-GoDirect-Cabin-Router-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> GoDirect Cabin Router for Business Aircraft
Dealers can find 2020 sales bulletins on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
